Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-41723 affecting package telegraf for versions less than 1.26.0-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-41723 affecting package telegraf for versions less than 1.26.0-2. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package telegraf is earlier than 1.26.0-2, affected by CVE-2022-41723
